previews.title: American Express | Your World of AMEX
previews.description: A WebAR experience that showcases the different benefits of using an American Express card. Features an interactive island with hotspots that users can click on to learn more about the benefits.

previews.title: Haribo | Easter Happiness Hunt
previews.description: A WebAR scavenger hunt game where players explore their real-world surroundings to find and collect hidden Haribo Easter candy. Over three annual iterations, the game evolved with new features including an endless mode and a competitive multiplayer experience.

previews.title: Manchester City OKX | Play for the City
previews.description: A WebAR experience utilizing Ready Player Me avatars that allows users to create a personalized avatar and see it perform football tricks in their real-world environment.

previews.title: Manchester City TECNO Mobile | #AnnounceYourself
previews.description: A WebAR experience and 360 walk-around feature that allows users to explore the Etihad Stadium and training grounds. Features an experience where users can sign for Manchester City, create their custom jersey and play a penalty shootout game.

previews.title: Owens Corning | Where Performance Meets Purpose
previews.description: A WebAR experience featuring a building that showcases Owens Corning's sustainable building solutions. Users can explore the building in their real-world environment and interact with hotspots to learn more about the products and their information.

previews.title: Spin Genie | Spin Genie Portal
previews.description: A 3D environment scavenger hunt experience that features objects from Spin Genie's different casino games.

previews.title: Diageo | Spirits Choice
previews.description: A mobile experience that helps users discover and choose Diageo spirits based on their preferences.

previews.title: Dare Iced Coffee | Dare Rainforest Alliance
previews.description: A tap-to-place AR SLAM experience featuring a Dare Iced Coffee bottle. Features interactive easter egg elements that reveal different animations surrounding the Dare Iced Coffee bottle.

previews.title: EE | Full Fibre House
previews.description: A WebXR experience that showcases the benefits of EE's Full Fibre broadband through an animated 2.5D house. Features a scannable image target and SLAM tracking to view different aspects of a house using EE's Full Fibre broadband.

previews.title: Google x McLaren | Absolute Scale F1 Car
previews.description: A WebAR tech demo that showcases an absolute scale 3D model of a McLaren F1 car that users can place in their real-world environment and manipulate to see the details.

previews.title: Planet Mojo | Mojo Character SLAM Experience
previews.description: A WebAR experience that showcases a Mojo character in their real-world environment using SLAM technology. Features an animated transition from a seed growing into the Mojo character.

previews.title: GOAL x Clear | Shirt of Firsts
previews.description: A 3D desktop experience that lets users explore a virtual gallery showcasing the Shirt of Firsts, a special edition football jersey featuring patches of various country flags. Each patch is interactive, revealing stories of key first achievements during the 2022 World Cup.

previews.title: Cadbury | Secret Santa Postal Service
previews.description: A WebAR image target experience that allows users to interact with a 3D postal service box, featuring a video with subtitles. Users can then interact with the CTA button to send physical Cadbury chocolate bars to their friends and family.

previews.title: Time Out | Time Out Virtual Reality Game
previews.description: A Unity-based VR escape room game where players solve puzzles and uncover hidden objects to break free before time runs out. The game features a unique scale mechanic that lets players grow or shrink to discover clues and hidden items from different perspectives.

previews.title: Homebound | Homebound 3D Rogue-like Game
previews.description: An Isometric exploratory roguelike game with crafting elements. Uses a comedic tone as the premise involves catching different creatures and putting them together to build a spaceship to get home.
